title: Diamond Leaf Pendant - Prakruti Haar Pendants
materials: VVS Clarity Diamonds (Brilliant Cut). Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Features five intricately designed leaf motifs, each meticulously set with brilliant cut diamonds. The openwork design allows light to pass through, enhancing the sparkle. Modern design combined with exquisite craftsmanship.
colors: Rose Gold and sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for daily wear or special occasions. Complements both traditional sarees and contemporary outfits. Ideal for anniversaries
description: A modern take on the classic Indian Haar, this diamond pendant embodies elegance and sophistication. The brilliant cut diamonds offer exceptional sparkle, and the 18K rose gold provides a warm, luxurious tone. The perfect fusion of contemporary design and timeless beauty.
